ProcessDescription.ows:Title: Multiplies a raster map with one or more raster maps
ProcessDescription.ows:Abstract: The manual page of this module is available here: http://grass.osgeo.org/grass70/manuals/html70_user/r.mult.html

Input.ows:Title: Resolution of the mapset in north-south direction in [m] or [degrees]
Input.ows:Abstract: This parameter defines the north-south resolution of the mapset in meter or degrees, which should be used to process the input and output raster data. To enable this setting, you need to specify north-south and east-west resolution.

Input.ows:Title: Resolution of the mapset in east-west direction in [m] or [degrees]
Input.ows:Abstract: This parameter defines the east-west resolution of the mapset in meters or degrees, which should be used to process the input and output raster data. To enable this setting, you need to specify north-south and east-west resolution.

Input.ows:Title: Band to select for processing (default is all bands)
Input.ows:Abstract: This parameter defines band number of the input raster files which should be processed. As default all bands are processed and used as single and multiple inputs for raster modules.

Output.ows:Title: The result of the mathematical operation
